attributes.action: A petition for more social housing to be built in West Norfolk
attributes.additional_details:
Are you currently on the housing waiting list for social housing (rented accommodation from local housing authority) ?
Currently waiting to downsize to a smaller property due to the governments bedroom tax ?
Fed up as theres no available homes you can bid on each week ?
Are you still waiting for social housing after being on the housing waiting list for 4 years or more ?

Then sign this petition...

Currently there are over 25,000 people on the housing waiting list for social housing in West Norfolk. Some of them have been waiting for more than 10 years. It is estimated that people could be waiting for up to 20 years before securing a home.
